name: Consecrated Scorpion
specialNames: The Fulgurous One, Devourer of the Mighty
description: An arthropod that has mutated after feeding from greater lifeforms.\nLifeforms are governed by the laws of evolution, Consecrated Beasts exploited these rules by being fortunate enough to discover a long-dead carcass of a greater being before any of their competition ever did. Animals and humans often have far more in common than the latter is willing to acknowledge.
